    Events & Workshops

    Events & Workshops

    Our research collaboration events, workshops, and symposiums

    Oct 13
    Completed

    1st Workshop on Systems for Agentic AI (SAA '25)

    Seoul, Korea

    A premier workshop bringing together leading researchers and practitioners to share insights, challenges, and breakthroughs in building high-performance systems for generative and agentic AI. Held in conjunction with the 31st ACM Symposium on Operating Systems Principles (SOSP '25).

    Workshop Focus:

    • Foundations of Generative and Agentic AI Inference
    • System Architectures for Serving AI Agents
    • Cost- and Latency-Optimized Inference Techniques
    • Real-World Deployment Case Studies
    • Hardware-Aware System Optimizations
    Workshop Website Submit Abstract
    Aug 5
    Completed

    AI Agent SF Meetup #5 - Agents in Production

    Tuesday, August 5, 2025

    San Francisco, CA

    Our collaboration team participated in this SF AI Agent Meetup featuring talks on enterprise-grade AI agent systems. Marquita Ellis from IBM Research presented "From Academic Innovation to Enterprise-Grade Systems for Impactful AI Agents" as part of our cross-institutional research initiative.

    Event Highlights:

    • Lightning talk announcing our UC Berkeley, Stanford, UIUC, IBM & Intesa Sanpaolo collaboration
    • Invitation to participate in our cross-sector enterprise AI Agent survey
    • Talks on Agent Gateway, Llama Stack in Production, and OpenAI Agent SDK
    • Networking with 350+ AI agent developers and researchers
    View Event Details Join Our Research
    Aug 2
    COMPLETED

    Agentic AI Summit 2025

    UC Berkeley Campus, Berkeley, CA

    Building on the momentum of Berkeley RDI's popular LLM Agents MOOC series with over 23,000 registered learners, this landmark summit brought together visionary leaders from academia, pioneering entrepreneurs, experts from leading AI organizations, venture capitalists, and policymakers.

    1,500+ Attendees
    Live Stream
    Industry Leaders

    Featured Speakers Include:

    • Bill Dally (Chief Scientist, NVIDIA)
    • Ion Stoica (Co-Founder, Databricks; UC Berkeley Professor)
    • Dawn Song (UC Berkeley Professor; Co-Director, Berkeley RDI)
    • Vinod Khosla (Founding Partner, Khosla Ventures)
    View Summit Details Watch Recordings

    Fall 2024
